mapper.sql: appid, privateKey, publicKey, expiration, remark, addTime, addUser, modifyTime, modifyUser, status, checkValue
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO security_key (
appid, privateKey, publicKey, expiration, remark, addTime, addUser, status, checkValue,
) VALUES (
#{appid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privateKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publicKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiration, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{addUser, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status, jdbcType=TINYINT}, checkValue(), )

INSERT INTO security_key ( appid, privateKey, publicKey, expiration, remark, addTime, addUser, status, checkValue) VALUES
(#{item.appid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.privateKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.publicKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.expiration, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{item.addUser, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.status, jdbcType=TINYINT}, checkValue())
mapper.update: UPDATE security_key SET privateKey = #{privateKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publicKey = #{publicKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expiration = #{expiration, jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyUser = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status, jdbcType=TINYINT}, checkValue = checkValue() WHERE appid = #{appid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND checkValue = #{checkValue, jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE security_key
checkValue = checkValue(),
privateKey = #{privateKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publicKey = #{publicKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expiration = #{expiration, jdbcType=BIGINT},
remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifyUser = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status, jdbcType=TINYINT},
WHERE appid = #{appid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND checkValue = #{checkValue, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM security_key WHERE appid = #{appid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM security_key WHERE appid = #{appid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT FROM security_key WHERE appid = #{appid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
